text: Offset Arrested in Georgia Offset Arrested for Gun Possession in Georgia EXCLUSIVE 7 / 21 7 : 30 AM PT - - Bail was just set at $ 17k. 7 / 21 6 : 47 AM PT - - Police say Offset had 3 handguns in the vehicle and $ 107, 000. 3 : 46 PM PT - - Offset was hit with 4 charges... possession of a firearm by a felon, possession of a weapon during a crime - - both felonies - - and possession of marijuana ( one ounce or less ), and an improper lane change... both misdemeanors. The rapper was apparently pulled over for the lane change, not for tinted windows. Offset is behind bars in Georgia after cops
